channel.title: Raging Passionate Melody
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Raging Passionate Melody" - how to pass this root mission ?

item.title: Re: Raging Passionate Melody
item.content:encoded:
1. how i pass this Raging Passionate Melody mission ?

Recompile, level or loop. High-end content is high-end and it make no apologies for it.

2. can i get tsukasa without sealed kunai ? i'm redeye.

Yes, though if you're serious about doing r00t, you may want to loop to Legacy anyway for their +1 Life when phase fighting. Otherwise the best way for a non-Legacy to get Tsukasa is to throw Poison Needles or Emo Rock CDs at the Dartboard.
